    Advanced Java - Project06Fox

    CpuModel Class

    This is the class is the interface to the database of CPUs

    Create Date: 11/6/2016 Due Date: 11/16/2016

        public static boolean update(int iIdentifier,

                             int iPerformance,
                             double dPrice)
        If the identifier exists then up date the record with the name, performance, and price
        Parameters:
        iIdentifier - - identifier in the database
        strCpuName - - Name of the CPU
        iPerformance - - Performance of the CPU
        dPrice - - Price of the CPU
        Returns:
        - Return true if successful
